bio.p: Lieutenant Colonel William R. Balkovetz currently serves at the Center for Army Analysis, FT Belvoir, VA as a campaign analyst for operational capabilities assessment – Pacific. His previous analytic experience includes: Operations Research Analyst for the 101st Airborne Division (Air Assault) while Chief of Training and Chief of Exercises; Operations Officer for the Total Army School System, TRADOC Integration Element, FT Lewis, WA; Executive Officer, TRADOC Analysis Center; Combat Analyst, TRADOC Analysis Center, Scenario Wargaming Center. He holds a B.S. degree from the United States Military Academy and a M.S. degree in Operations Research, Kansas State University.
